scripts.build: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=esnext --format=esm --out-extension:.js=.mjs --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" --external:aws-lambda --external:@aws-sdk/client-secrets-manager --outdir=dist && cp -rf src/templates dist/
